channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: West Virginia Mountaineers Unveil New Football Uniforms
item.description: West Virginia unveiled new uniforms over the weekend that pay homage to different eras of Mountaineer football while maintaining a few modern touches.

item.title: Suge Knight Expresses Sympathy for Diddy Amid Legal Troubles
item.description: Diddy's legal troubles aren't anything to cheer about, says Suge Knight ... a shocking sentiment given the decades-long bad blood between the two, and he reveals his sentiments in a brand new documentary "TMZ Presents: The Downfall of Diddy." The…

item.title: Grit and Glow: Tampa Bay Rays Unveil Skateboard-Inspired City Connect Uniforms
item.description: The Tampa Bay Rays unveiled their new Nike MLB City Connect Series uniform today, taking inspiration from the region’s skateboarding culture while also mixing in a few fun little nods to the team’s history. These uniforms are set to make their on-field debut during a special weekend series from May

item.title: Justin Bieber Shares Pictures of Himself Crying, Hailey Bieber Responds
item.description: Justin Bieber's letting fans in on an emotional moment ... sharing pics of himself crying to Instagram -- and drawing a reaction from his wife. The beloved singer-songwriter shared the pics as part of a series of posts he shared Friday ... all of…

item.title: Jacksonville Jaguars Reveal 30th Season Logo Following Fan Vote
item.description: After asking fans to vote among four unique designs, the Jacksonville Jaguars officially unveiled their new 30th season logo during their 2024 NFL Draft party on Thursday evening.

item.title: Jerry Seinfeld Goes After 'Extreme Left' Over Comedy Ahead of 70th Birthday
item.description: Jerry Seinfeld reflected on the state of comedy ahead of his 70th birthday -- and he thinks modern-day showbiz has lost its sense of humor ... all 'cause of politically correct culture. The legendary comedian was talking on the New Yorker's Radio…

item.title: NFL Will Allow Players To Wear Guardian Caps In Games
item.description: The NFL announced it will now allow players to wear Guardian Caps, a 12-ounce soft shell that fits over their helmets, during regular-season games in an effort to reduce head injuries.

item.title: 'Bachelor' Nick Viall Marries Natalie Joy After Almost 4 Years Together
item.description: Nick Viall is officially no longer a bachelor ... as the reality TV star-turned-podcaster wed fiancée Natalie Joy over the weekend. The Bachelor Nation alum and the surgical technologist said "I do" in an outdoor ceremony in Savannah, Georgia. The…

item.title: Report: CFL’s Saskatchewan Roughriders to Add Fourth Uniform in 2024
item.description: Riders reportedly adding uniform that's predominantly a darker shade of green than usual; helmet to feature logo filed with Canadian trademark office in 2022

item.title: Mike Myers Debuts White Hair in First Public Appearance in Over a Year
item.description: Mike Myers returned to the spotlight for a rare public appearance this weekend ... but folks had to do a double take, 'cause nobody could recognize him with his new hair color. The actor stepped out Saturday for the 49th AFI Life Achievement Award…
